Articles.Content: I was wondering if someone could make a mod that replaced the 3 main kerbals with Spongebob, Patrick, and Squidward.

Just change their names in the persistence.sfs file, no biggie.

I don't want this mod in the open; who knows what it will do??

Just change their names in the persistence.sfs file, no biggie.

I don't want this mod in the open; who knows what it will do??

I meant, and actually put the characters ingame. With animations and everything

I meant, and actually put the characters ingame. With animations and everything

I honestly don't think that's possible because it would take A LOT of work to replace the kerbals, and replace/redo all their animations and I think if it was possible, it would only work with one model since each kerbonaut uses the same model.
If only Nickolodian could pay some modders to reskin KSP to be under the sea in Bikini Bottom (goal to get out to the beach!).
